```{r}
{
library("unikn")
}

# Genear 5 colores a partir de 2:

pal <- c("#c9bfcf","#3b2a46")
pal <- unikn::usecol(pal, n = 5)
```




```{r}
# Genear 10 colores a partir de 3:

pal <- c("red","#475682", "blue")
pal <- unikn::usecol(pal, n = 10)
```
